title.rendered: ANEXO 40 FRONT LIGHT, PERFORMANCE THROUGHOUT INNOVATION

content.rendered:
AXENDO 40 FRONT LIGHT, PERFORMANCE THROUGH INNOVATION

news, tech components

Spanninga brand stands for innovation. “Keep ahead of light” is and has always been the Spanniga philosophy, based on constant and extended research in new technologies, optics and electronics.

DESCRIPTION

The elegant high-power AXENDO 40 distinguishes itself with its amazing styling and technology. For each type of bicycle and for every cyclist, the AXENDO range offers a perfect solution headlamp. For city practice, we have chosen for our e-bikes the AXENDO 40 Lux light front fork headlamps offering a great visibility distance. It also has an elegant contrasting silicone band, which gives it a unique touch.

TECHNOLOGY

The AXENDO 40 has 1 high-power REBEL LED and features the unique REVERSE BEAM TECHNOLOGY which projects an impressive 40 Lux light output in a bright – but non-blinding – light beam. The light rays of the LED are projected backwards onto a mirror directing it into a powerful conical beam with a perfect light spread. The light is then divided over a large surface which makes it less aggressive to the eyes. The headlamp is equipped with a robust stainless steel front fork bracket and a high-efficiency front reflector for optimal safety and visibility.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

Light source :  1 white Led /40 Lux

Power source : E-bike 6-36VDC (Xe)

Weight :  70 gr
